name: Punch
descName: Inflicts Neutral-type damage.

name: Typhoon
descName: Causes Air-type damage and steals Agility over an area of effect.

name: Blindness
descName:
Causes area-of-effect Neutral-type damage and reduces the target's AP.
The AP reduction effect cannot be stacked on the same target or unbewitched.

name: Natural Attack
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and steals Intelligence.

name: Barricade
descName: Reduces all close-combat damages received for 1 turn, and increases the target's MP if they receive long-rage damage. Can't be cast while in the "Glyphorce" state.

name: Truce
descName:
Reduces damage taken by allies and enemies for 1 turn.
The caster can not cause damage during the next turn.
Can not be cast in the Glyphorce state.

name: Rampart
descName:
Reduces damage received.
The protection for allies is weaker.
Can not be cast in the Glyphorce state.

name: Feca Shield
descName:
Reduces damage taken.
Can not be cast in the Glyphorce state.

name: Backlash
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and steals Strength.

name: Cloudy Attack
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and steals Chance.

name: Burning Glyph
descName:
Places a Glyph which causes Fire-type damage.
Enemies and allies lose MP while they're in the Glyph's area of effect.
Prevents the caster from casting other elemental Glyphs in the same turn.

name: Teleglyph
descName: Teleports to the targeted cell and triggers the targeted Glyphs.

name: Glyph of Blindness
descName:
Places a Glyph which causes Earth-type damage.
Enemies and allies lose AP while they're in the Glyph's area of effect.
Prevents the caster from casting other elemental Glyphs in the same turn.

name: Glyph of Repulsion
descName: Places a Glyph which inflicts Fire-, Water-, Air- and Earth-type damage to those around the targeted cell at the end of the turn.

name: Shiver
descName: Attracts targets and causes Air-type damage to enemies in a cone-shaped area of effect.

name: Paralysing Glyph
descName:
Places a Glyph which causes Water-type damage.
Allies and enemies lose Range while they're in the Glyph's area of effect.
Prevents the caster from casting other elemental Glyphs in the same turn.

name: Gravitational Glyph
descName:
Places a Glyph which applies the Unshakable state, preventing the caster from being pushed and applies the Gravity state to allies and enemies.
Affects all characters in the area of effect.

name: Aggressive Glyph
descName:
Places a Glyph which inflicts Air-type damage and Attracts at the beginning of the turn.
Enemies and allies cause less damage while in the Glyph's area of effect.
Prevents the caster from casting other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Lethargy
descName:
Causes Fire-type damage and reduces MP.
The lost MP cannot be stacked or unbewitched.

name: Bubble
descName: Causes Water-type damage and reduces range.

name: Bastion
descName:
Reduces all long-range damages received and increases the target's Power if they receive close-combat damage.
Can not be cast in the Glyphorce state.

name: Dragonic
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage; entities who attack the target are healed.

name: Canine
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and reduces Lock.

name: Takeoff
descName: Sacrifices an allied Summons to take its place.Inflicts Air-type damage at the start and end of the teleportation.

name: Dragon's Breath
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.When a Wyrmling attacks the target, nearby allies are healed.

name: Sacrificial Fire
descName:
Sacrifices a Summons to heal nearby.
Only works on the caster's Summons.

name: Animal Link
descName:
Merges with an allied Summons to change its own appearance and to take control of Summons from the same family.
The targeted Summons is killed.

Tofu: 
• All Tofus gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Agility and Air-type damage. 
• The caster gains 2 MP.

Gobball: 
• All Gobballs gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Strength, Earth-type damage and Neutral-type damage. 
• The caster reduces damage suffered by 20%.

Wyrmling: 
• All Wyrmlings gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Intelligence, Fire-type damage and heals. 
• The caster gains a healing bonus.

Toad:
• All Toads gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Chance and Water-type damage. 
• The caster gains a damage bonus.

name: High-Energy Shot
descName: Considerably increases Vitality, damage, MP and AP of one of the caster's Summons.

name: Fossil
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies and removes MP.

name: Symbiosa
descName:
Takes control of an allied Summons.
Tofu: unlocks a spell that lets you switch places with an ally.
Gobball: unlocks a spell that lets you attract an ally or enemy.
Wyrmling: unlocks a spell that lets you heal an ally.
Toad: unlocks a spell that repels the target to the targeted cell.

name: Whip
descName:
On enemies: inflicts damage in the element of the caster's transformation.

On allies: applies an effect depending on the caster's transformation:
• Tofu: +2 MP
• Gobball: 20% reduction of damage suffered.
• Wyrmling: Heals the target.
• Toad: Power bonus.

name: Red Wyrmling
descName:
Summons a Red Wyrmling that inflicts Fire-type damage in a line and unbewitches enemies.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can heal an ally.
Prevents a Gobball, Toad or Tofu from being summoned during the same turn.

name: Natural Defence
descName:
The targeted Summons becomes invulnerable, but only lives for one turn.
Only works on the caster's Summons.

name: Duster
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Damage is increased for each Tofu present in the area.

name: Black Tofu
descName:
Summons a Black Tofu that reduces enemies' Lock and whose damage increases every turn. 
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can switch places with an ally.
Prevents a Gobball, Toad or Wyrmling from being summoned on the same turn.

name: Gobball
descName:
Summons a Gobball that locks enemies and reduces their Dodge.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can attract a target.
Prevents a Wyrmling, Toad or Tofu from being summoned on the same turn.

name: Crackler Punch
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Call to Order
descName:
Kills an allied Summons.
Recovers the AP used to summon it if it was a Tofu, Gobball, Toad or Wyrmling.

name: Podgy Tofu
descName:
Summons a Podgy Tofu that repels enemies and whose damage increases every turn.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can switch places with an ally.
Prevents a Gobball, Toad or Wyrmling from being summoned on the same turn.

name: Black Wyrmling
descName:
Summons a Black Wyrmling that attacks enemies in a line and heals nearby allies.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can heal an ally.
Prevents a Gobball, Toad or Tofu from being summoned during the same turn.

name: Black Gobball
descName:
Summons a Black Gobball that locks enemies.
It applies the Gravity state every other turn.
Prevents a Wyrmling, Toad or Tofu from being summoned on the same turn.

name: Living Bag
descName:
Summons a Living Bag that suffers damage on behalf of its allies.
The Living Bag dies after 4 turns.
When it is attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Fortune
descName: Increases the target's Dodge for the current turn, then increases its Power for the following turn.

name: Shovel Throwing
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Shovel Kiss
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Reducing Key
descName: Reduces range.

name: Unsummoning
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Damage is doubled on summons.

name: Pandora's Box
descName: Restores HP based on the target's maximum Vitality, but decreases the caster's ability to reduce MP for the following turn.

name: Mound
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage in a cross shape.

name: Ghostly Shovel
descName: Ghostly Shovel inflicts Fire-type damage and can reverse the effects of spells cast on the target.

name: Clumsiness
descName: Subtracts MP.

name: Coins Throwing
descName: Inflicts long-range Water-type damage.

name: Greed
descName: Increases damage to allies and enemies in an area of effect.

name: Prime of Life
descName: Deals Earth-type damage and lowers MP Dodge at short range.

name: Mass Clumsiness
descName: Reduces the AP of enemies in the area of effect.

name: Acceleration
descName: Increases the target's MP.

name: Shovel of Judgement
descName: Causes Water-type damage and reduces MP.

name: Living Shovel
descName:
This spell summons a shovel that repels enemies and reduces their resistance to MP loss.
When it is attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Slaughtering Shovel
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage.

name: Bribery
descName:
On allies: heals and applies the Pacifist state for 1 turn.
On enemies: applies the Pacifist and Invulnerable states for 1 turn.
The spell's effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Living Chest
descName:
Summons a Living Chest that locks enemies.
It inflicts damage in an area of effect around it and detects anyone or anything invisible. The less life it has, the greater the damage it inflicts.
When it is attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Deviousness
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Chakra Concentration
descName: Steals Fire-type health from the target whenever it triggers a trap.

name: Tricky Blow
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage on enemies.
Repels the target.

name: Furrow
descName:
Deals Fire damage in an area of effect.
Attracts targets.
Steals Intelligence.

name: Tricky Trap
descName: Causes Fire damage and attracts.

name: Insidious Poison
descName: Poisons the target for 2 turns and inflicts Air-type damage.

name: Fear
descName: Pushes an ally or an enemy onto the targeted cell.

name: Mistake
descName:
Causes Air- and Earth-type damage.
Steals Agility and Strength.
Applies an unhealable health penalty.

name: Paralysing Trap
descName: Reduces MP.

name: Con
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage.

name: Poisoned Trap
descName: Poisons the player who sets it off with Earth-type damage for 3 turns.

name: Invisibility
descName: Renders invisible.

name: Repelling Trap
descName:
Repels allies and enemies.
Causes Air damage to enemies.

name: Double
descName:
Summons a controllable double that has the same characteristics as the summoner.
Does not attack, and dies after 2 turns, switching places with its caster.

name: Miry Trap
descName:
Places a trap that inflicts Water-type damage.
Allies near the target are healed by up to 50% of the damage inflicted.

name: Lethal Attack
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Insidious Trap
descName: Places a trap. Once triggered, enemies who complete their turn in the area of effect suffer Air-type damage.

name: Cruelty
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and increases the caster's MP.

name: Mass Trap
descName: Places a trap that inflicts Earth-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Lethal Trap
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Slow Down
descName:
Causes Water-type damage and removes 1 AP from the target.
Takes 1 extra AP from enemies in the Telefrag state.
The AP removal cannot be unbewitched.

name: Rewind
descName: At the end of its turn, teleports the targeted ally back to where it was at the start of the turn.

name: Hand
descName:
Causes Fire-type damage and removes 1 AP from the target.
Takes extra AP from enemies in the Telefrag state.
The AP removal cannot be unbewitched.
Removes the Telefrag state.

name: Frostbite
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage to enemies and teleports the target back to their previous position.

name: Haziness
descName:
Reduces AP in an area of effect this turn.
Increases AP in an area of effect the next turn.

name: Synchro
descName:
Summons Synchro, who gains in power and heals when a Telefrag is generated, once per turn.
Synchro will die, causing Air-type damage in an area of effect within 3 cells, if it suffers a Telefrag.
It is not affected by the spell Rewind.
Starting from the turn after it is cast, its summoner loses 1 AP.

name: Loss of Motivation
descName:
Causes Earth-type damage to enemies along a diagonal.
Reduces the duration of the effects on targets in the Telefrag state and removes it.

name: Teleportation
descName:
Teleports the caster symmetrically in relation to the target.
The caster gains 2 AP for 1 turn each time they generate a Telefrag.
The cool down period is removed when a Telefrag is generated or consumed.

A Telefrag is generated when one entity takes the place of another.

name: Temporal Paradox
descName:
Teleports allies and enemies (within an area of effect of 4 cells around the Dial) symmetrically in relation to the Accomplice (or the Dial).
At the start of the Accomplice's (or Dial's) turn: teleports the same targets again symmetrically.
Sets the cool down period of Xelor's Dial and the Accomplice to 1.

name: Flight
descName: At the start of caster's next turn, teleports the target to their previous position.

name: Xelor's Punch
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage to enemies.
Teleports the target symmetrically in relation to the spell's caster.

name: Dark Ray
descName:
Causes Earth-type damage in a line.
The base damage of the spell is doubled against enemies in the Telefrag state.
Removes the Telefrag state.

name: Shrivelling
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage in a line.
Causes additional damage to enemies in the Telefrag state.

name: Counter
descName: Reflects part of the damage taken in close-combat back at the attacker.

name: Clock
descName:
Water-type life steal.
The caster gains 1 AP at the start of their next turn.
Takes AP from enemies in the Telefrag state and removes it.
The AP removal can not be unbewitched.

name: Temporal Dust
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the damage is inflicted in the area of effect and nearby enemies are teleported symmetrically relative to the centre of the area of effect.

name: Xelor's Dial
descName:
Summons a Dial which causes Fire-type damage in an area of effect, and removes AP from enemies in the Telefrag state.
Gives AP to allies in the Telefrag state around it.

name: Time Theft
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on the target.
The caster gains 1 AP at the start of their next turn.

name: Mummification
descName:
The caster can no longer inflict damage with their elemental spells and gains 2 MP for 1 turn.
Gives the Telefrag state to all allies and enemies for 2 turns.
When the Telefrag state is removed, the caster gains 100 Power for 2 turns.

name: Xelor's Sandglass
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage and removes AP from the target in a straight line, without line of sight.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the spell's effect is decided in an area of effect.
The AP removal cannot be unbewitched.

name: Roulette
descName: Summons a Roulette that provides a random bonus to everyone at the start of its turn.

name: Heads or Tails
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and increases the damage inflicted by the target for 1 turn if it is an enemy.

name: Ecaflip's Luck
descName:
Halves damage suffered for 1 turn.
On the next turn, damage suffered will be increased by 50%.

name: Clover
descName:
Applies a bonus to critical hits, but reduces damage from weapons for 2 turns.
If recast during the effect's duration, applies a critical hit penalty instead.

name: Catnip
descName: Increases the target's MP by 1 for 1 turn.

name: Wheel of Fortune
descName: Increases damage.

name: Topkaj
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Feline Spirit
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage and moves the caster to the other side of the target.
For each time it is cast, the caster loses a bewitchment turn at the end of his next turn.

name: Bluff
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Inflicts Water-type damage for critical hits.

name: Playful Claw
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on several cells along a straight line.
Inflicts Water-type damage for critical hits.

name: Repercussion
descName:
Applies a shield around the target.
The shield's value is higher on the caster.

name: Claw of Ceangal
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Repels the target, then moves closer to it

name: Perception
descName:
The target is healed of 4% of its life per nearby enemy.
Detects anyone or anything invisible in the area of effect.

name: Rekop
descName:
Inflicts Air-, Water-, Earth- and Fire-type damage.
The spell takes effect randomly: either in 1 turn, in 2 turns or in 3 turns, and the effects can only be stacked once per target.
The later the damage is applied, the more significant it will be.

name: Smell
descName:
Grants MP but removes AP for the current turn, across an area of effect. The next turn, it grants AP but removes MP.
The AP used to cast the spell are returned to the Ecaflip.

name: Rough Tongue
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage to enemies.
On enemies: reduces the target's range this turn, but increases it the next turn.
On allies: increases the target's range this turn, but reduces it next turn.
Can only be stacked once.

name: Summoning Claw
descName: Summons a Kitten that inflicts Water-type damage on enemies.

name: Reflex
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect and applies an unhealable health penalty.

name: All or Nothing
descName:
On enemies: Immediately inflicts Water-type damage in an area of effect and heals the following turn.
On allies: Immediately heals in an area of effect and inflicts Water-type damage the following turn.
The caster is always affected first.

name: Fate of Ecaflip
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage, attracts and then pushes the target back.
If the target receives pushback damage in the same turn, it will also suffer a 2-turn MP penalty.

name: Thunderous Word
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies and reduces their AP.

name: Wounding Word
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.

Allies near the caster (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted before reduction.

name: Turbulent Word
descName: Steals HP through Air-type damage.

name: Alternative Word
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage on enemies.
Heals allies.

name: Forbidden Word
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.

Allies near the target (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted before reduction.

name: Stimulating Word
descName:
The target gains the Stimulated state: it gains 2 AP for 4 turns.

Doesn't affect Eniripsas.

name: Preventing Word
descName: The target gains shield points for 2 turns.

name: Frightening Word
descName: Repels the target.

name: Friendship Word
descName:
Summons a Coney that gives the caster the Stimulated state as long as it is alive: it gives 2 AP.
The Coney heals its allies.

When the Coney dies, a heal glyph appears: entities who end their turn on the glyph are healed.

name: Selective Word
descName:
Causes Fire-type damage on enemies in an area of effect.
Heals allies.

name: Regenerating Word
descName: The target is healed with a delay: at the start of the caster's next turn, and the following turn.

name: Whirling Word
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect.

Allies near the caster (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted before reduction.

name: Word of Youth
descName: Heals an ally and removes 1 bewitchment turn from them.

name: Blaring Word
descName:
Causes Water-type damage in an area of effect.

Allies near the targets (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted before reduction.

name: Puzzling Word
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage on enemies and heals allies.

name: Paralysing Word
descName:
Reduces MP for 1 turn.
At the end of the caster's turn, heals nearby allies (within 2 cells).

name: Lifting Word
descName:
Switches places with an ally (excluding Summons).

Removes the Stimulated state. Applies the Unhealable state to the caster if they ally doesn't have the Stimulated state.
The Coney can be targeted, but is killed.

name: Word of Silence
descName:
Reduces AP in an area of effect, and reveals invisible allies and enemies. 
Allies who have the Stimulated state, as well as the caster, are not affected.

name: Revitalising Word
descName:
All allies who have the Stimulated state are healed, but they lose the Stimulated state.
Kills the Coney if already summoned.
Sets the recasting delay for Stimulating Word to 1 turn.

name: Word of Recovery
descName: Completely heals an allied target, but then makes it Unhealable for 3 turns.

name: Pressure
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and applies an Erosion penalty.

name: Jump
descName: Teleports onto the targeted cell and increases damage received by enemies found on adjacent cells.

name: Intimidation
descName: Inflicts Neutral-type damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Duel
descName:
Reduces the target's and caster's MP, applies the Gravity state to them, and makes them invulnerable to long-range damage.
Only works if cast on an enemy.

name: Divine Sword
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and increases the damage of targeted allies.

name: Sword of Fate
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
The damage inflicted is increased from the second time this spell is cast.

name: Massacre
descName: When the enemy target suffers spell damage, it inflicts 50% of the damage on entities next to it.

name: Friction
descName: The target gets closer to its attacker if it receives spell damage. The caster must be in line with the target.

name: Precipitation
descName: Increases the target's AP for the current turn but reduces AP the following turn. Cannot be used with weapons or the spell Iop's Wrath.

name: Cut
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and reduces MP.

name: Blow
descName: Repels allies and enemies found around the target cell.

name: Sword of Judgement
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and steals Fire HP without a line of sight.

name: Power
descName: Increases the target's Power.

name: Destructive Sword
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and reduces the target's Critical Hit rate.

name: Vitality
descName:
Temporarily increases the target's percentage HP.
The HP bonus is less effective on allies than on the caster.

name: Strengthstorm
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Celestial Sword
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage in the area of effect.

name: Concentration
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Damage is increased against summons.

name: Iop's Wrath
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
On the third turn after being cast, the spell's damage is increased.

name: Sword of Iop
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage in a cross-shaped AoE.

name: Magic Arrow
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and steals range from the target.

name: Critical Shooting
descName: Increases the Critical Hit rate.

name: Frozen Arrow
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and reduces AP.

name: Lashing Arrow
descName: Applies Erosion to enemies and repels them by 2 cells.

name: Burning Arrow
descName: Burning Arrow inflicts Fire-type damage and repels targets present in the area of effect.

name: Powerful Shooting
descName: Increases damage caused by spells.

name: Atonement Arrow
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage, increase the spell's damage every 3 turns, and restricts the target's ability to use movement spells.

name: Bat's Eye
descName: Reduces the range of targeted characters and steals health through Water-type damage. Also detects invisible objects and fighters within the area of effect.

name: Retreat Arrow
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage on enemies and pushes the target.

name: Paralysing Arrow
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and steals MP from the target.

name: Punitive Arrow
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and increases the spell's damage every 2 turns.

name: Distant Shooting
descName: Increases the range of targets present in the area of effect.

name: Plaguing Arrow
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage without the need for a line of sight.

name: Poisoned Arrow
descName: Inflicts Neutral-type damage over several turns and reduces MP.

name: Destructive Arrow
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and reduces the damage of an enemy.

name: Tormenting Arrow
descName: Causes Air- and Fire-type damage.

name: Slow Down Arrow
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and removes AP in the area of effect.

name: Absorptive Arrow
descName: Steals HP through Air-type damage.

name: Explosive Arrow
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Bow Skill
descName: Increases damage.

name: Earthquake
descName:
In an area of effect of 3 cells around each allied tree
 • Causes Fire-type damage.
 • Pulls the target toward the caster.
• Detects invisible enemies.

name: Transmuted Madoll
descName:
Replaces the targeted Tree with a Madoll which causes enemies to lose AP and gives them the Infected state.

When a targeted enemy in the Infected state is hit by certain Sadida spells, all the targets in the same state are hit as well.
The spells which take advantage of this are: Bramble, Poisoned Wind, Tear, Dolly Sacrifice, Soothing Bramble, Aggressive Bramble, Insolent Bramble, and Bush Fire.
Upon its death, the Madoll returns to being a Tree.

name: Bramble
descName:
Causes Earth-type damage.

Cast on a Tree: allows a Blocker to switch places with the Tree. It cannot receive any damage for 1 turn.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, inflicts Earth-type damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Bush Fire
descName:
This spell inflicts Fire- and Water-type damage.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, causes Fire- and Water-type damage to all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Wild Grass
descName: Wild Grass inflicts Fire-type damage and removes MP in an area of effect.

name: Tree
descName:
Summons a Tree.
For 1 turn, the Tree cannot be used as an intermediary for casting other spells.
After 1 turn, the Tree is usable and can no longer be pushed or pulled.

name: Transmuted Ultra-Powerful
descName:
Replaces the tree with an Ultra-Powerful doll which takes MP and MP Loss Resistance from enemies in an area of effect, as well as any enemies in contact with trees.
Upon its death, the Ultra-Powerful doll becomes a tree again.

name: Insolent Bramble
descName:
Reduces the duration of the target's bewitchments by 4 turns.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, reduces the duration of the bewitchments of all enemies with the Infected state.

name: Transmuted Sacrificed
descName:
Replaces the targeted Tree with a Sacrificial Doll which causes Air-type damage and dies.

Each turn the Sacrificial Doll remains alive increases its Vitality, as well as the damage it will cause.
Upon its death, the Sacrificial Doll becomes a Tree again.

name: Transmuted Inflatable
descName:
Replaces the targeted Tree with an Inflatable Doll which heals allies (within 3 cells of it).

It also heals all allies in contact with Trees.
Upon its death, the Inflatable Doll becomes a Tree again.

name: Manifold Bramble
descName: Causes Earth-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Soothing Bramble
descName:
Removes MP from enemies for 2 turns.
Heals allies.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, it also causes MP loss for any enemy in the Infected state.

name: Transmuted Block
descName:
Replaces the targeted Tree with a Block which will try to get in close to enemies to obstruct them.

If the spell Bramble has been cast on an allied Tree, the Block exchanges places with that Tree and can't be damaged for 1 turn.
Upon its death, the Block becomes a Tree again.

name: Aggressive Bramble
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, causes Earth-type damage to all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Tear
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.

On a Tree that has just appeared: causes its leaves to grow and makes it possible for a Sadida to use it as an intermediary for casting other spells.
If the target is in the Infected state: causes Water-type damage to all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Poisoned Wind
descName: Kills the targeted doll to transform it into a Leafy Tree.

name: Sylvan Power
descName:
Replaces the targeted Tree with a controllable tree that can repel a target, reduce the duration of bewitchments, or heal in an area of effect.
At the end of its turn, it becomes a normal Tree again.

name: Dolly Sacrifice
descName:
Causes Water-type damage when cast on an enemy.
Steals Water-type health when cast on an ally or Summons.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state: causes Water-type damage to all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Natural Gift
descName:
Allies within 2 cells of the targeted Tree are healed.
Allied characters within 2 cells of the targeted Tree share received damages between them for 1 turn.
The Tree is killed.

name: Paralysing Poison
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage at the end of the turn and applies the Infected state to enemies.

When an enemy target in the Infected state is hit by a single-target Sadida spell, all targets in the Infected state are also affected by this spell.

name: Leek Pie
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Perfidious Boomerang
descName: Steals health of a random element.

name: Moon Hammer
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Reduces range.

name: Cawwot
descName: Summons a Cawwot which heals nearby allies and enemies.

name: Release
descName: Repels allies and enemies in the caster's vicinity.

name: Lightning Strike
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Outpouring
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies and moves the caster closer to the target.
The caster gains shield points.

name: Felintion
descName:
Steals Water-type health points from enemies.
Repels enemies and allies.

name: Soul Capture
descName: Captures defeated creatures' souls at the end of a fight.

name: Mount Taming
descName:
Applies the Taming state, enabling you to capture wild mounts.
Increases the experience won by the caster's mount after a fight.

name: Jinx
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and reduces the chance of inflicting critical hits.

name: Dispersing Arrow
descName: Repels enemies and allies, even if they are blocked by other enemies or allies.

name: Spiritual Leash
descName:
Revives the last allied character who died. If the summoner dies, the resuscitated character dies too.
While the resuscitated ally is alive, other allies receive a 30% reduction to all elemental resistances.

name: Reinforced Protection
descName:
Increases Glyphs' damage and the caster's Power.
Deactivates the caster's protection spells.

name: Drunkenness
descName:
Summons a Barrel that attracts enemies.
If carried or thrown: heals around itself.

name: Rhol Bak
descName: Returns all players to their previous positions.

name: Pull Out
descName:
Prevents the use of all displacement spells and MP.
The spell's caster is affected the following turn.
The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: The Tree of Life
descName:
Transforms the targeted Tree into a Tree of Life.
For 2 turns, any damage suffered by the tree is given back to its attacker in the form of heals.
Heals Sadida Summons each turn of the game.

name: Brutal Word
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Boombot
descName:
Summons a controllable robot that can push, attract or trigger bombs.
The robot explodes at the end of its turn.

name: Boozer
descName:
Applies the Drunk state and removes 1 MP.
Reduces damage suffered.
Recasting Boozer cancels out its effects.

name: Blazing Fist
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Schnaps
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Terror
descName: Repels the target and reduces the probability of inflicting critical hits on enemies.

name: Alcoholic Breath
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and pushes the target back. 
The Drunk state is required.

name: Vulnerability
descName:
Increases the final damages received by the target for 2 turns.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Debauchery
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Karcham
descName:
Carries the target. Throws the target when cast for the second time.
Deactivates the carried target's lines of sight for spells.

name: Vertigo
descName:
Throws the carried entity and increases its Lock.
Attracts entities aligned with the targeted cell.

name: Stabilization
descName:
Prevents the target from being moved.
Increases resistance to MP loss.

name: Eviction
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies.
The target is teleported behind the caster.

name: Tipple
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Applies an AP withdrawal penalty.

name: Stain
descName:
Reduces the duration of the target's effects by 1 turn.
Applies a damage penalty. 
The Drunk state is required.

name: Propulsion
descName:
Throws the carried entity.
Inflicts Fire-type damage on enemies and repels around the targeted cell.

name: Melancholy
descName: Causes Water-type damage.

name: Zatoishwan's Wrath
descName:
Applies the Drunk state.
Increases the caster's damage and AP.

name: Explosive Flask
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage in the area of effect.

name: Pandatak
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage for several cells along a straight line.

name: Pandiniuras
descName:
Increases the target's MP.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Spirit Bond
descName:
Summons a Pandawasta which blocks opponents' movements.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Roguery
descName:
Creates several images of the Rogue to deceive opponents, and allows the Rogue to teleport.
The images disappear if they receive damage.
This spell ends the Rogue's current turn.

name: Detonator
descName: Triggers a bomb to explode from a distance.

name: Extraction
descName: Linear Fire steal.

name: Kickback
descName:
Pushes bombs back.
The closer to a bomb the spell is cast, the further back it will push it.
Pushes targets that aren't bombs back one cell.
Increases allies' damage.

name: Grenado
descName:
Places a bomb that inflicts Air-type damage and takes away MP.
Explodes automatically and does less damage if it is cast directly on a target.

name: Water Bomb
descName:
Places a bomb that inflicts Water-type damage and takes away AP.
Explodes automatically and does less damage if it is cast directly on a target.

name: Magnet
descName:
Attracts bombs.
Attracts allies and enemies one cell. 
Can only be cast on an occupied cell.

name: Boomerang Daggers
descName: Inflicts Air damage in a circular arc.

name: Dirty Trick
descName: The Rogue swaps positions with the targeted bomb.

name: Carbine
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and removes MP in a diagonal line.

name: Powder
descName: Makes a bomb unmoveable and makes it explode with a combo bonus if it loses all its HP.

name: Pulsar
descName:
Causes Fire damage.
The greater the percentage of MP the character has at the time of casting, the higher the damage inflicted.

name: Deception
descName: Causes Water damage in a ring around the Rogue and reduces one AP.

name: Explobomb
descName:
Places a bomb that inflicts Fire-type damage.
Explodes automatically and does less damage if it is cast directly on a target.

name: Remission
descName:
Pushes back allies or enemies that are attacking the target from an adjacent cell.
If cast on a bomb: reduces damage taken from a distance.

name: Last Breath
descName:
Increases the combo bomb bonus and the allies' damage.
Temporarily decreases the Rogue's maximum Vitality.

name: Countdown
descName:
Cast on a bomb: Automatically explodes at the end of the caster's next turn and applies Erosion in an area of effect.
On an ally: Increases damage.

name: Overload
descName:
Allows targeted bombs to reduce the length of time their targets' effects last when they explode. 
The effect comes into play next turn and becomes more and more powerful each turn.

name: Blunderbuss
descName:
Causes Water damage in a cone-shaped area-of-effect.
Applies an unhealable health penalty.

name: Kaboom
descName: Renders the Rogue and its allies invulnerable to  bomb explosions and gives them a bonus.

name: Diffraction
descName: Gives each ally and enemy a shield.

name: Intrepid Mask
descName:
Applies the Intrepid Mask.
Increases Lock for the caster and any allies in the area of effect.

name: Coward Mask
descName:
Applies the Coward Mask.
Increase the MP of the caster and their allies next to them.

name: Psychopath Mask
descName:
Applies the Psychopath Mask.
Increases the close-combat damage of the caster and their allies.

name: Martelo
descName:
Steals HP in the Earth element.
Applies a Dodge penalty.

name: Retention
descName:
Steals life in the Air element.
Subtracts MP from the target.

name: Decoy
descName:
Steals life in the Water element from enemies.
Attracts the target in a straight line.

name: Distance
descName: Deals Water-type damage to enemies and pushes the target back in a straight line.

name: Apathy
descName:
Deals Earth-type damage.
Subtracts MP from the target.

name: Furia
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies.
Increases the caster's damage for 2 turns.

name: Capering
descName:
Teleports to the targeted cell.
Inflicts Air-type damage in a cross-shaped AoE.

name: Boliche
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies.
Pushes the target back and moves the caster closer.

name: Plastron
descName: Applies a shield around the caster and their allies in the area of effect.

name: Tortoruga
descName: Applies a shield around the target.

name: Trance
descName:
Applies a shield around an allied target.
Temporarily decreases the caster's HP.

name: Bling
descName: Brings the caster closer to the target.

name: Stampede
descName: Teleports over a short distance and increases MP.

name: Ardour
descName: Makes the target immune to Lock, but makes it Unhealable.

name: Reinforcement
descName:
Inflicts Air-, Fire-, Earth- and Water-type damage on enemies.
Moves the caster away from the target.

name: Masquerade
descName:
Causes Neutral-type damage to the caster and the target. 
The higher the life of the caster, the more damage will be caused.

name: Picada
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage.

name: Scaphander
descName: Any AP removed will increase MP. Increases the caster's damage and pushback damage as well as that of targeted allies.

name: Tide
descName: Switches places with the target in a diagonal line and inflicts damage on enemies.

name: Backwash
descName: Pushes the target diagonally and inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Torrent
descName: Inflicts Water damage and attracts the target diagonally.

name: Pilfer
descName: Steals Fire-type HP in a diagonal line.

name: Surge
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and applies a damage penalty to the target.

name: Froth
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies in an area of effect.

name: Vapour
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect and reduces the chance of inflicting critical hits.

name: Anchor
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Trident
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Inflicts extra Earth-type damage when the target takes pushback damage.

name: Harpooner
descName: Places an attack turret which steals Water-, Earth-, Air- or Fire-type health from all enemies and allies within range.

name: Lifesaver
descName:
Places a defence turret which will heal all allies and enemies within its area of effect. 
Heals given are proportionate to the targets' maximum health.

name: Tacturret
descName: Places a tactical turret which will push back enemies and allies.

name: Evolution
descName:
Unlocks new spells for the targeted turret.
Heals the targeted turret if it receives an evolution.
Increases targeted allies' Power.

name: Dreadnaut
descName:
Immunises targeted allies against damage inflicted by the Harpooner and against movement caused by the Tacturret. 
Immunises enemies against heals from the Lifesaver.

name: Salt Armour
descName:
Protects turrets and allies from distance attacks.
The protection cast on allies is weaker.
Puts turrets in the Unmovable state.

name: Ambush
descName:
Inflicts Fire-, Water-, Air- and Earth-type damage.
Applies the Ambush state on the target so it can be targeted by the Harpooner's special spell.

name: First Aid
descName:
Heals the target.
Applies the First Aid state on the targeted ally so that it can be targeted by the Lifesaver's special spell.

name: Periscope
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies.
Applies the Periscope state on the target so that it can be targeted by the Tacturret's special spell.
Increases the allied target's range

name: Grapnel
descName: Brings the caster closer to one of his turrets, in a straight or diagonal line.

name: Breakwater
descName:
Allows the targeted turret to protect targets situated nearby when the spell is cast.
Close-combat damage taken by targets is transferred to the turret.

name: Weapon Skill
descName: Increases the damage inflicted and healing caused by weapons.

name: Portal
descName:
Places a portal.
When several portals are active, you can use them to teleport, or to project spells.
Portals increase projected spells' damage and healing.

name: Insult
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
If cast through a portal: reduces Lock.

name: Lightning Fist
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies and repels the target.
If cast through a portal: pushes further back.

name: Distribution
descName: When the target suffers spell damage, the allies near the target (within 2 cells) are healed of part of the damage inflicted.

name: Wakfu Ray
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage on enemies in a straight line.
Heals allies.

name: Stretching
descName:
Temporarily reduces the caster's HP but increases the range of the target.
Increases the range of the Portal spell.

name: Therapy
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies.
If cast through a portal: attracts the target.

name: Neutral
descName: Deactivates a Portal for 1 turn.

name: Shock
descName:
Inflicts Earth damage to enemies in a cross.
Draws targets towards the targeted cell.

name: Affliction
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage.

name: Stupor
descName: Places a trap that summons a portal when triggered.

name: Healing
descName: An area-of-effect heal.

name: Offence
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Odyssey
descName: Moves the caster away from the target and brings the target closer to the caster.

name: Snub
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies.
If cast through a portal: removes a turn of bewitchment.

name: Focus
descName: The target gains Power when teleported through a portal.

name: Bullying
descName: Inflicts Air damage and pushes targets.

name: Audacious
descName: Inflicts Water damage without line of sight.

name: Parasite
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
If cast through a portal: inflicts additional damage at the end of turn.

name: Ridicule
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Removes MP if the spell is cast through a portal.

name: Mutual Assistance
descName:
For 2 turns, everyone in the area around the caster is healed every time an ally goes through a portal.
The caster gets 1 AP every time an enemy goes through a portal.

name: Flamethrower
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage and applies the Fire state. Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn).
• Earth: +20% damage suffered (1 turn).

name: Stalagmite
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and applies the Water state. Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

Depending on the target's elemental state, it will undergo the following effects:
• Air: -25% damage (1 turn).
• Fire: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Earth: -2 MP (1 turn).

name: Telluric Wave
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage and applies the Earth state.
Places an Earth Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: 3 Range stolen for 1 turn.
• Water: loses 2 MP for 1 turn.
• Fire: 20% extra damage suffered for 1 turn.

name: Ether
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and applies the Air state. Places an Air rune at the target's location.

Depending on the target's elemental state, it will undergo the following effects:
Water: inflicts 25% less damage for 1 turn.
Fire: loses 3 AP for 1 turn.
Earth: 3 Range stolen from it for 1 turn.

name: Runification
descName:
Triggers all elemental runes: they inflict damage, give their elemental state and improve the caster's characteristics.
Can generate elemental combinations.

name: Elemental Drain
descName:
Inflicts damage and steals characteristics in an element, depending on the target's elemental state.

Consumes the target's elemental state.

name: Storm
descName:
Steals Earth-type health in an area of effect and applies the Earth state.
Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: 3 Range stolen for 1 turn.
• Water: loses 2 MP for 1 turn.
• Fire: 20% extra damage suffered for 1 turn.

name: Striking Meteor
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage and applies the Earth state. Repels the target.
Places an Earth Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: 3 Range stolen for 1 turn.
• Water: loses 2 MP for 1 turn.
• Fire: 20% extra damage suffered for 1 turn.

name: Glacier
descName:
Inflicts Water-type area-of-effect damage and gives the Water state. Places a Water Rune at the location of targets hit.

Depending on the targets' elemental states, they will undergo the following effects:
Air: cause 25% less damage for 1 turn.
Fire: suffers a Dodge penalty of 50 for 1 turn.
Earth: lose 2 MP for 1 turn.

name: Icy Shards
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and gives the Water state. Attracts the target by 2 cells.
Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: 25% less damage for 1 turn.
• Fire: Dodge penalty of 50 for 1 turn.
• Earth: loses 2 MP for 1 turn.

name: Transfixing Gust
descName:
Steals Air-type health in an area of effect and applies the Air state.
Places an Air Rune at the location of targets hit.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: 25% less damage for 1 turn.
• Fire: loses 3 AP for 1 turn.
• Earth: 3 Range stolen for 1 turn.

name: Astral Blade
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and gives the Air state.
Reduces enemies' Range, increases allies' Range.
Places an Air Rune Rune at the target's location.

Depending on the target's elemental state, it will undergo the following effects:
Water: causes 25% less damage for 1 turn.
Fire: loses 3 AP for 1 turn.
Earth: loses 3 Range for 1 turn.

name: Burning Stroke
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type area-of-effect damage and gives the Fire state. Places a Fire Rune at the location of targets hit.

Depending on the targets' elemental states, they will undergo the following effects:
Water: suffer a Dodge penalty of 50 for 1 turn.
Air: lose 3 AP for 1 turn.
Earth: suffer 20% extra damage for 1 turn.

name: Deflagration
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage and gives the Fire state. Reduces the duration of the target's effects for 1 turn.
Places a Fire Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects its undergoes:
• Water: Dodge penalty of 50 for 1 turn.
• Air: loses 3 AP for 1 turn.
• Earth: 20% extra damage for 1 turn.

name: Elemental Shield
descName:
The target gains elemental resistance.
Every time it suffers damage, it loses some resistance to the attack's element. But, the attacker enters their attack's elemental state.

Can generate combinations of elements.

name: Runic Treatment
descName:
The allied target is healed depending on the number of runes present.

Consumes all runes without activating their effects.

name: Propagation
descName:
Applies the target's elemental state to all the enemies within 2 cells.
Can generate different elemental combinations.

If an elementary rune is targeted, generates an effect depending on the element within 2 cells:
Fire: Divides the heals enemies receive by 2 for 1 turn.
Earth: Reduces enemies' active effects by 1 turn.
Water: Applies the Gravity state to enemies, preventing them from teleporting for 1 turn.
Air: Applies the Unable to Lock state to enemies, preventing them from Locking for 1 turn.

name: Polarity
descName:
Attracts enemies who have the "Water" state.
Repels enemies who have the "Earth" state.
Switches places with an enemy who has the "Fire" state.
Moves to the opposite side of an enemy who has the "Air" state.

Consumes the elemental states of affected enemies.

name: Imprint
descName:
Places a rune for every enemy who is affected by an elemental state.
The power of the rune depends on the level of Imprint.

name: Contribution
descName:
The target gains bonuses (stackable twice) depending on the enemies' elemental states:
• Water: 150 Power.
• Fire: 10% of the caster's HP in shield points.
• Air: 1 AP.
• Earth: 1 MP.

Enemies lose their elemental states.

name: Prey
descName:
The target becomes Prey.
When they are attacked, their attacker is healed by part of the damage inflicted.

name: Sniff
descName:
Teleports the caster next to the Prey.
Reduces Rage.

name: Tetanisation
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage, applies the Gravity state, and reduces MP.

Increases Rage.

name: Cutting Down
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
If the target is Prey, steals MP.

name: Tracking
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Gets closer to the target if it's Prey.

name: Watchdog
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Damages suffered by the caster is reduced by 15% for 1 turn.

Increases Rage.

name: Mastiff
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
If the target is Prey, steals health.

name: Cerberus
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
If the target is Prey, applies a Dodge penalty.

name: Ulna
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
If the target is Prey, the caster gains 1 MP.

name: Marrow Bone
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
If the target is Prey, spell damage is increased for 3 turns.

name: Tibia
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage around the caster and repels.

Increases Rage.

name: Bloodhound
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.

If the target is Prey, increases the caster's Power.

name: Carrion
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and applies Erosion.

Increases Rage.

name: Carcass
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
If the target is Prey, spell damage is increased for 3 turns.

name: Appeasement
descName: Reduces the caster's Rage to heal them.

name: Convergence
descName:
On allies: gets closer to the target.
On enemies: attracts the target.

name: R-Canine
descName: Reduces Rage and increases Power.

name: Protective Pelt
descName:
Applies a shield around the target.

If the target suffers pushback damage, it loses the shield, and the caster's Rage increases.

name: Bark
descName:
The target can no longer be pushed or attracted, and gains 2 MP for 1 turn.

If the target suffers close-combat damage, spell effects are removed and the caster's Rage increases.

name: Yapper Launcher
descName:
Summons a Yapper that advances toward the Prey and attacks them each time its master inflicts damage with a class spell.
Its damage is increased on Summons.

name: Panic
descName:
Distances the target from the Prey.
If the spell is cast on the Prey, distances all entities within 2 cells off the target.

name: Concentration Arrow
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and attracts towards the target.

name: Erosive Arrow
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and applies an Erosion penalty.

name: Withdrawal Arrow
descName: The spell's caster moves back 2 cells.

name: Paralysing Arrow
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and removes AP.

name: Repulsive Arrow
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and repels by 1 cell.

name: Absolute Acuteness
descName: All of the Cra's spells can be cast through obstacles.

name: Redemption Arrow
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage, which is increased if the spell is cast again the next turn.

name: Crushing Arrow
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and applies the Gravity state.

name: Recall Beacon
descName: Summons a Beacon that switches position with the caster (at the start of the next turn).

name: Assailing Arrow
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies and the caster moves back 1 cell.
On an ally: moves the caster closer by 1 cell.

name: Arrow of Judgement
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
The greater the percentage of MP the character has at the time of casting, the higher the damage inflicted.

name: Tactical Beacon
descName:
Summons a Beacon that can serve as an obstacle and target.
The Beacon suffers half the damage from allies.

name: Slaughtering Arrow
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
The spell's damage is increased on the next turn.

name: Curative Arrow
descName: Heals and increases heals received by the target.

name: Tyrannical Arrow
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage if the target is pushed.
Inflicts Fire-type damage if the target suffers pushback damage.

name: Barricade Shot
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and repels the target.

name: Devouring Arrow
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Damage is applied when the spell is cast on another target.
May be stacked on the same target 3 times.

name: Striking Arrow
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
At the end if its turn, the target inflicts Water-type damage and removes AP in a 2-cell circle around it.

name: Fulminating Arrow
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Spreads over the nearest enemy in a radius of 2 cells. Can bounce off the Tactical Beacon.
The spell's damage is increased with each additional target.

name: Sentinel
descName: On the next turn, the caster loses all their MP, but gains a damage bonus.

name: Reprisal
descName: Immobilises the target.

name: Godsend
descName: The allied target regains 25% of its HP, but suffers 25% extra damage.

name: Nerve
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage for a normal hit and Air-type damage for a critical hit.

name: Leap
descName: Teleports to the targeted cell.

name: Heads or Tails
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage for a normal hit.
Increases Strength for a critical hit.

name: Roar
descName:
Increases Power depending on the number of enemies present in the area of effect.
Detects anyone who is invisible in the area of effect.

name: Corollary
descName: Applies an Erosion penalty.

name: Summoning Stroke
descName: Summons a Kitten that heals allies.

name: Peril
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on targets who have more than 50% of their HP.
Heals targets who have less than 50% of their HP.

name: Spell Strike
descName:
Summons a Roulette that gives a random bonus to its attacker when attacked.
Gives a random bonus to its summoner when summoned.

name: Yowling
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Heals allies.

name: Lapping Up
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies and removes MP.
The target gains 1 MP on the next turn.

name: Pussycat
descName:
On allies: regain 15% of their HP per turn for 3 turns.
On the caster: regains 10% of their HP per turn for 3 turns.

name: Pawpads
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage on the enemy target and repels the caster from the target.

name: Lucky Star
descName: If the allied target is attracted or pushed, it regains 5% of its HP.

name: Redistribution
descName: Applies the Unlockable state, then the Gravity state on the next turn.

name: Bravado
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
The caster gains pushback damage for each enemy hit.

name: Misadventure
descName:
Steals Water-type health for normal hits.
Steals Earth-type health for critical hits.
The spell does not affect the caster.

name: Misfortune
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies and moves the caster closer to the target.

name: Trickery
descName:
The damage and the attack element are modified randomly on each casting:
• Earth: 5 AP
• Air: 4 AP
• Water: 3 AP
• Fire: 2 AP

name: Kraps
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies and pushes the target.

name: Necronyx
descName: Applies the Necronyx state to the target and ends the caster's current turn.

name: Contempt
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and attracts the target.

name: Tribulation
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage.

name: Rigid Portal
descName:
Places a portal.
When several portals are active, you can use them to teleport, or to project spells.
Portals increase projected spells' damage.

name: Convulsion
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and repels the target.

name: Lazybeam
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Steals Fire-type health if the spell is cast through a portal.

name: Interruption
descName: Deactivates all allied portals.

name: Affront
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage if the spell is cast through a portal.

name: Contraction
descName: Places and activates a portal on a cell occupied by an ally.

name: Sinecure
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Applies a resistance penalty to pushback damage if the spell is cast through a portal.

name: Diffusion
descName: The target reflects 35% of damage suffered in an area of effect.

name: Distortion
descName: Summons a totem that places and activates a portal on cells occupied by its attackers.

name: Correction
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Moves the caster closer to the target.

name: Conjuration
descName: If the target goes through a portal, the next attack it suffers inflicts 25% extra damage.

name: Curative Palm
descName: Heals the target.

name: Exodus
descName: Teleports the caster symmetrically in relation to the target.

name: Cabal
descName:
Increases the target's MP.
If cast through a portal: the MP bonus is increased.

name: Composure
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage only through a portal.

name: Virus
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.
Allies in the area of effect are healed of up to 50% of the damage inflicted on enemies.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Persiflage
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Reduces range if the spell is cast through a portal.

name: Coalition
descName:
Increases an ally's AP.
If cast through a portal: the AP bonus is increased.

name: Conflagration
descName:
Heals the targeted ally.
If cast through a portal: heals allies in an area of effect around the target.

name: Affectionate Word
descName:
Summons a Coney that applies shield points to allies and applies the Stimulated state to its summoner.
When the Coney dies, it places an end-of-turn glyph that applies shield points.

name: Slighting Word
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage.

name: Taboo Word
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage.

name: Seductive Word
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage and summons a flask.
When it is attacked by an ally, it suffers twice the amount of damage and returns 100% of health points lost to its attacker.
When it dies, it inflicts damage in an area of effect.
It dies if it enters the Stimulated state.

name: Self-Sacrificing Word
descName:
Increases the Power of the target, but reduces the heals it receives.
Applies the Stimulated state.

name: Mischievous Word
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.

Allies near the caster (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted before reduction.

name: Defensive Word
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Reduces the duration of the effects on the target.
Applies an Erosion penalty on the caster.

name: Impartial Word
descName:
On allies: heals the target and inflicts Fire-type damage around the target.
On enemies: inflicts Fire-type damage and heals around the target.

name: Resounding Word
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage.

name: Agonising Word
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on an ally.
The damage suffered is increased and inflicted on enemies around the target.
Enemies affected are pushed back.

name: Regenerating Mark
descName: Places an end-of-turn glyph that heals.

name: Life-Giving Word
descName:
Increases MP.
Requires and consumes the Stimulated state.

name: Furious Word
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on an ally and increases its Power depending in the number of enemies next to it.
The damage suffered by the target is increased and inflicted around it.

name: Whirling Word
descName: Steals Air-type health.

name: Overwhelming Word
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and removes MP.

Allies near the target (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted before reduction.

name: Sacrificial Word
descName: The damage suffered by the targeted ally heals allies in the Stimulated state.

name: Rallying Word
descName:
Moves the caster closer to an ally, then attracts it.
Requires and consumes the Stimulated state on the ally.
May be cast on the Coney without it being in the Stimulated state, but it kills the Coney.

name: Galvanising Word
descName:
All Stimulated allies receive the Unlockable state.
Consumes the Stimulated state.
Kills the Coney if already summoned.
Sets the recasting delay for the Stimulating Word spell to 1 turn.

name: Uniting Word
descName:
On stimulated allies: all other stimulated allies give it 10% of their HP.
On non-stimulated allies: it gives 10% of its HP to other stimulated allies.

name: Pernicious Word
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on an ally.

300% of damage suffered is applied to enemies around the target.

name: Spade Throw
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Hard Cash
descName: Steals Water-type health.

name: Living Satchel
descName:
Summons a Living Satchel that shares damage between all allies situated in the summoning zone.
The Living Satchel disappears after 2 turns.
When it is attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Ghostly Spade
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage. Entities who attack the target are healed.

name: Wandering
descName: The target switches places with the Living Bag or the Living Satchel.

name: Toolbox
descName: Increases an ally's AP and MP, but applies the Pacifist state.

name: Peat Bog
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
The greater the percentage of MP the character has at the time of casting, the higher the damage inflicted.

name: Armlock
descName: Heals an ally but removes 1 non-dodgeable MP.

name: Obsolescence
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
The caster gains 1 MP on each casting.

name: Living Spade
descName:
Summons a Living Spade that steals Air-type health.
It heals its summoner when it is attacked by an ally.

name: Miserliness
descName:
Reduces MP but increases AP.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Spade Kiss
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage when the target suffers MP reduction.

name: Vivacity
descName: Switches places with the target and heals it if it is an ally.

name: Loafylactic
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and removes AP.

name: Opportuneness
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and increases the caster's Power.

name: Spade of Judgement
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and repels.

name: Carnivore Spade
descName: Steals Water-type health if the target is healed.

name: Decadence
descName:
Applies a final damage bonus to an ally for 1 turn.
On the next turn, the target suffers more damage.

name: Correction
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Regenerating Chest
descName:
Summons a chest that heals nearby allies.
Heals allies that attack it.
If it is killed by an enemy, it heals the entire enemy team.

name: Natural Attraction
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and attracts the target.

name: Dazzling
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and applies a Dodge penalty.

name: Fortification
descName: Reduces damage suffered.

name: Gust
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and pushes the targets.

name: Swelling
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and pushes the target.

name: Manoeuvre
descName: Switches places with the target.

name: Fulminating Glyph
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and places a glyph that increases allies' close-combat damage.

name: Lifelessness
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and steals Intelligence.

name: Stormy Attack
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage without line of sight, and reduces the chance of inflicting critical hits.

name: Trouncer
descName:
Moves the caster closer to the target.
Increases the caster's Lock.

name: Tetany
descName: Inflicts Neutral-type damage and removes AP.

name: Aegis
descName: Summons a shield that suffers damage instead of allies present in its glyph-aura.

name: Barrier
descName:
Places a glyph-aura around the target at the start of the next turn.
The glyph inflicts damage on the target if it crosses the glyph.

name: Reinforcement
descName: Teleports to the first available cell between the caster and the targeted ally.

name: Protective Glyph
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and places a glyph-aura that reduces damage suffered by allies.

name: Tension
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and pushes the target.

name: Roaming Glyph
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Places a glyph that increases allies' Dodge.

name: Excursion Glyph
descName: Places a glyph that switches the allies' places with the caster's.

name: Perception Glyph
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Places a glyph around the caster that increases allies' range.

name: Inertia
descName:
Applies the Gravity state around the caster.
Increases Lock by 25 per enemy present in the area of effect.

name: Ataraxia
descName: Applies a shield that reduces the damage inflicted by the next attack.

name: Celestial Wave
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and applies the Air state. Places an Air rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -25% damage (1 turn).
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn).
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn).

name: Stinger
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage and applies the Earth state. Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn).
• Water: -2 MP (1 turn).
• Fire: +20% damage suffered (1 turn).

name: Manifestation
descName:
Triggers the targeted rune.
If the cell is empty, summons a Manifestation for 1 turn:
• Water: the Manifestation attracts all nearby entities (within 2 cells).
• Air: entities next to the Manifestation are teleported symmetrically.
• Fire: the caster switches places with the Manifestation.
• Earth: entities next to the Manifestation are repelled.
Upon its death, applies its elemental state to nearby entities.

name: Cataract
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and applies the Water state. Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: -25% damage (1 turn).
• Fire: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Earth: -2 MP (1 turn).

name: Ember
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage and applies the Fire state. Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn).
• Earth: +20% damage suffered (1 turn).

name: Morph
descName:
Inflicts damage depending on the target's element.
The constraints for casting the spell are modified for 2 turns, depending on the element:
• Water: reduces the AP cost of the spell.
• Fire: increases damage.
• Air: increases range.
• Earth: increases the number of castings per target.

name: Hurricane
descName:
Steals Air-type health and applies the Air state. Places an Air rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -25% damage (1 turn).
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn).
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn).

name: Telluric Blade
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage and applies the Earth state. Places an Earth rune at the target's location.
Reduces the probability of enemies' critical hits, and increases the probability of allies' critical hits.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn).
• Water: -2 MP (1 turn).
• Fire: +20% damage suffered (1 turn).

name: Quadramental Current
descName:
Triggers the following effects on the target, depending on its element:
• Water: the target attracts all nearby entities (within 2 cells).
• Air: entities near the target are teleported symmetrically.
• Earth: the target repels all entities next to it.
• Fire: the target switches places with the nearest entity.

name: Stalactite
descName:
Steals Water-type health and applies the Water state. Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: -25% damage (1 turn).
• Fire: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Earth: -2 MP (1 turn).

name: Volcano
descName:
Steals Fire-type health and applies the Fire state. Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn).
• Earth: +20% damage suffered (1 turn).

name: Elemental Trap
descName:
Places a trap that applies effects depending on the element of the target that triggers the trap:
• Fire: the next heals received during the turn are divided by 2.
• Air: applies the Unable to Lock state.
• Earth: reduces the duration of active effects by 1 turn.
• Earth: applies the Gravity state.

name: Elemental Guardian
descName:
Summons a static elemental whose power increases every time a different elemental combo is generated.
It attacks in the target's element.

name: Flood
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and applies the Water state. Moves the caster closer to the target.
Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: -25% damage (1 turn).
• Fire: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Earth: -2 MP (1 turn).

name: Elemental Cycle
descName:
Changes the target's element, depending on its element:
Earth -> Water -> Fire -> Air -> Earth

name: Sun Lance
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage, switches places with the target and applies the Fire state.
Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -50 Dodge (1 turn).
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn).
• Earth: +20% damage suffered (1 turn).

name: Runic Overcharge
descName:
Consumes all runes without activating their effects.
The target suffers damage depending on the number and element of runes consumed.

name: Tectonic Breach
descName:
Steals Earth-type health and applies the Earth state. Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn).
• Water: -2 MP (1 turn).
• Fire: +20% damage suffered (1 turn).

name: Comet
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage, moves the caster away and applies the Air state.
Places an Air rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -25% damage (1 turn).
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn).
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn).

name: Elemental Loop
descName:
Inflicts damage in the target's element.
Changes the target's element:
Water -> Earth -> Air -> Fire -> Water

name: Runic Repulsion
descName:
Repels each rune on the field in a cross-shaped AoE.
Consumes the runes without triggering their effects.

name: Threat
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and attracts the target.
The caster gains shield points.

name: Pounding
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect and removes MP.

name: Determination
descName:
Applies the Unmovable state and reduces damage suffered by 25% for 1 turn.
Cannot be unbewitched.

name: Endurance
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Applies shield points to the caster.

name: Cleaver
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage in an area of effect.
Applies shield points for each enemy affected.

name: Destructive Ring
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage in a ring, and attracts targets.

name: Gathering
descName: The target attacks its nearby allies (within 2 cells) when it is attacked.

name: Violence
descName: Attracts nearby entities and increases the pushback damage and Lock for each enemy in the area of effect.

name: Accumulation
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
If the spell is cast on the caster, the spell does not inflict any damage, and damage is increased for the next casters.

name: Fracture
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage up to the targeted cell.
Applies an Erosion penalty.

name: Fight Back
descName: The target is repelled by 2 cells each time it attacks the caster.

name: Grip
descName: Removes all MP from the targeted enemy but makes it invulnerable.

name: Virtue
descName: Applies an area shield, but reduces the caster's Power.

name: Agitation
descName: Increases MP and Dodge for the current turn.

name: Tumult
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.
The higher the number of targets, the higher the damage.

name: Zenith
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect.
The damage is increased for each MP available when the spell is cast.

name: Pygmachia
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage in an area of effect.
Spell damage is increased for 1 turn when it is cast.

name: Sentence
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Inflicts extra Fire-type damage in an area of effect at the end of the target's turn.

name: Conquest
descName: Summons a Scarecrow, which redistributes 50% of the damage it suffers within 2 cells.

name: Repulsive Fang
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
If the target finishes its turn next to an ally, it is repelled by the caster.

name: Aquatic Wave
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Increases the damage inflicted on the target by Summons.

name: Albino Tofu
descName:
Summons an Albino Tofu that inflicts Air-type damage and removes MP.
The damage it inflicts increases with every turn.
Prevents a Gobball, Toad or Wyrmling from being summoned on the same turn.

name: Animal Union
descName:
Merges with an allied Summons to take control of Summons from the same family.

Tofu: 
• All Tofus gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Agility and Air-type damage. 
• The caster gains 2 MP.

Gobball: 
• All Gobballs gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Strength, Earth-type damage and Neutral-type damage. 
• The caster reduces damage suffered by 20%.

Wyrmling: 
• All Wyrmlings gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Intelligence, Fire-type damage and heals. 
• The caster gains a healing bonus.

Toad:
• All Toads gain 2 AP, as well as 50% of the caster's Chance and Water-type damage. 
• The caster gains a damage bonus.

name: Sedimentation
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Reduces the target's Power.

name: Whirlwind
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
On an allied Summon: inflicts Water-type damage in an area of effect and repels it.

name: Protective Balm
descName: The caster loses 10% of their health points, but applies a shield to the targeted Summons.

name: Albino Toad
descName:
Summons an Albino Toad, which applies a Water-type poison.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can repel a target to the targeted cell.

name: Crop
descName:
Applies effects depending on the caster's transformation:
Toad: Moves the caster closer to the target.
Gobball: attracts the target.
Wyrmling: repels the caster.
Tofu: switches places with the target.

name: Plucking
descName: The targeted Tofu inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect, and dies at the end of its turn.

name: Gobbly
descName: Summons a Gobbly, which Locks and removes AP.

name: Albino Wyrmling
descName:
Summons a Wyrmling that inflicts Fire-type damage.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can heal an ally.
Prevents a Gobball, Toad or Tofu from being summoned during the same turn.

name: Dragon Heart
descName: The target is healed when a Wyrmling inflicts damage.

name: Black Toad
descName:
Summons a Black Toad that inflicts Water-type damage on contact.
The more MP it uses before attacking, the less damage it inflicts.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can repel a target to the targeted cell.

name: Constriction
descName: Steals Earth-type health.

name: Geyser
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Increases Power.

name: Slimy Toad
descName:
Summons a Slimy Toad that inflicts Water-type damage in an area of effect.
If controlled by whoever summoned it, it can repel a target to the targeted cell.

name: Relay
descName:
Gives the target 2 AP.
If another entity is already under the spell's effects, it loses its AP bonus, and both entities switch places.

name: Favouritism
descName:
Kills all of the caster's Summons except for the targeted Summons.
It gains 1 AP, 1 MP, 50% Vitality and 30% damage per Summons sacrificed.

name: Replacement
descName: Kills the targeted Summons, and replaces it with another one (depending on the caster's transformation).

name: Animal Communion
descName: All allied Summons share the damage they suffer, but they suffer 50% more damage.

name: Condemnation
descName:
Inflicts Air- and Fire-type damage.
Damage is applied when the spell is cast on another target.
May be stacked on the same target 2 times.

name: Fit of Rage
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
The damage is increased each time the spell is cast, but the bonus is lost if the spell is not cast again.

name: Venison
descName: Temporarily applies the Prey state to the target. It is possible to have several prey at once.

name: Jaw
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage. 
Increases the Power of allies near the target. The caster is not affected.
Increases Rage.

name: Calcaneus
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage. 
If the target is in the Prey state, it is attracted by one cell.

name: Stripping
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage. 
If the target is in the Prey state, spell damage is increased depending on the number of allies next to the target.

name: Woof
descName:
Steals Fire-type health. 
If the target is in the Prey state, its Pushback damage resistance is reduced.

name: Affection
descName:
Switches places with an allied target.
Reduces Rage.

name: Gangrene
descName:
Applies Erosion to the target.
Increases Rage.

name: Muzzle
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
If the target is in the Prey state, the caster gains Lock.

name: Humerus
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage and teleports the caster behind the target.
Increases Rage.

name: Hunt
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage. 
If the target is in the Prey state, it is repelled.

name: Beaten
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
If the target is in the Prey state, allies next to it gain 1 MP.

name: Snuggletooth
descName:
Reduces the caster's Power.
Reduces Rage.

name: Ferocity
descName: If the target is moved or suffers an MP reduction, it gains Power.

name: Radius
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage. 
The caster switches places with the target.
Increases Rage.

name: Vertebra
descName: Poisons the target for 2 turns and inflicts Water-type damage.

name: Pursuit
descName: Places a glyph-aura that attracts allies towards the nearest Prey when it is activated.

name: Amarok
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
If the target is in the Prey state, attracts entities aligned with the target.

name: Gripe
descName: If the caster suffers long-range damage, they gain Pushback damage and Lock.

name: Carving Up
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Reduces the duration of active effects on the target.
Increases Rage.

name: Determination
descName:
The targeted prey suffers extra damage for 1 turn.
Increases Rage.

name: Tailing
descName: Pushes the target back, then moves the caster closer to the target.

name: Hangover
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
The spell damage increases each time it is cast.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Blow-Out
descName: Applies the Drunk state and grants Lock. Does not block the casting of Sober spells.

name: Burning Circle
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.
The Sober state is required.

name: Consolation
descName:
Attracts the target towards the caster. Heals the target if it is an ally.
The Sober state is required.

name: Numbness
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and removes MP in an area of effect.
