The Sober state is required.

name: Brandy
descName:
Throws the target onto the targeted cell. Heals allies in an area of effect around the point of impact.
The Sober state is required.

name: Liqueur
descName:
Steals Air-type health.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Chamrak
descName:
Carries the target. Throws the target when cast for the second time.
Deactivates the carried target's lines of sight for spells.

name: Waterfall
descName:
The caster throws the target and moves closer to it.
The Sober state is required.

name: Poisoned Undergrowth
descName: Applies an Earth poison at the start of turn.

name: Leafy Tree
descName: Places a Leafy Tree.

name: The Block
descName: Summons a Block.

name: Proximity Poison
descName: Applies the Infected state to all enemy targets next to a doll or a Leafy Tree belonging to the caster.

name: Rise of Sap
descName:
Steals Water-type health in an area of effect.

On an allied Tree that has just appeared: causes its leaves to grow and makes it possible for a Sadida to use it as an intermediary for casting other spells.

name: The Madoll
descName: Summon a Madoll.

name: Repotting
descName: Teleports the Leafy Tree to the first cell available between it and the caster.

name: Vegetal Influence
descName:
Replaces the targeted tree with a controllable Tree, which can attract a target and remove MP.
At the end of its turn, it becomes a Tree again.

name: The Sacrificial Doll
descName: Summons a Sacrificial Doll.

name: Shake
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage on contact with each allied Tree.
The caster gains 1 MP for each enemy hit.

name: Inoculation
descName: Kills the targeted Tree. Inflicts Air-type damage and applies the Infected state in an area of effect.

name: Force of Nature
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage depending on the number of Trees placed on the field by the caster.

name: Bane
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and steals Water-type life from all infected enemies.

name: Vegetal Altruism
descName: Kills the targeted Tree. Gives an infinite Vitality bonus to all the caster's dolls.

name: The Inflatable
descName: Summon an Inflatable.

name: Sherpa
descName:
If the caster suffers a close-combat attack, they carry their attacker.
The Sober state is required.

name: Plaguing Bramble
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage in an area of effect around an allied Tree.

name: Contagion
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and spreads the Infected state to enemies next to the target.
If the target is in the Infected state: inflicts Air-type damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Voodoo Curse
descName: The target suffers Fire-type damage if it loses MP, and Earth-type damage if it loses AP.

name: Paralysing Bramble
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and removes MP.

name: The Ultra-Powerful
descName: Summons an Ultra-Powerful.

name: Harmony
descName:
Applies the Rooted state to the caster and removes all their MP at end of the turn.
The caster shares damage with their dolls.

name: Nausea
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and repels the caster from the target.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Distillation
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage in an area of effect and reduces Range.
The Sober state is required.

name: Brewing
descName:
Applies the Gravity state.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Prohibition
descName:
Applies the Unhealable state to the target and makes it invulnerable to close-combat damage.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Hooch
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage depending on the MP used.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Fermentation
descName:
Applies a shield for the current turn and a second shield the following turn.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Absinthe
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage without line of sight.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Filthipint
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage in an area of effect around the caster.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Stretcher
descName:
Throws the target to the targeted cell. The target is healed depending on the number of entities passed over.
The Sober state is required.

name: Bamboo
descName:
Summons a Bamboo.
The caster mounts the Bamboo if they are in close combat while in the Sober state.
Deactivates the caster's lines of sight for spells if carried by a Bamboo.
A Pandawa carried by a Bamboo cannot carry other entities.

name: Inebriation
descName:
Summons a Barrel that increases Power in an area of effect around it.
When it is thrown, it removes MP from enemies in an area of effect around the point of impact.

name: Mist
descName: Places a glyph-aura that makes allies present in the area of effect invisible.

name: Perfidious Trap
descName: Places a single-cell trap that attracts in an area of effect.

name: Pitfall
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage. Each trap triggered increases the Pitfall spell's damage.
The damage bonus disappears when the spell is cast.

name: Toxines
descName: The target suffers an Air-type poison when it is affected by a trap.

name: Raiding
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage. 
50% of damage is distributed in the form of Healing to allies around the target. 
Does not affect the caster.

name: Cut-Throat
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and increases the Power of traps.

name: Plotter
descName:
Summons a controllable Double.
Each trap triggered increases the Double's Power.
The Double inflicts Neutral-type damage in an area of effect around it when it dies.

name: Larceny
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and steals Chance.

name: Trapster
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage. Each trap triggered increases the Trapster spell's Range.
The Range bonus disappears when the spell is cast.

name: Ambush
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and attracts the target towards the Double.

name: Toxic Injection
descName:
Applies an Air-type poison to the target. Each trap triggered lowers the recast time for Toxic Injection.
The recast time reduction disappears when the spell is cast.

name: Fragmentation Trap
descName:
Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Fire-type damage.
The damage increases depending on the distance from the centre of the area of effect.

name: Drift Trap
descName: Places a trap that pushes back 2 cells.

name: Epidemic
descName:
Applies an Air-type poison to enemies at the end of turn.
The target spreads the poison around itself in an area of effect.

name: Repelling Trap
descName: Single-cell trap that repels by 2 cells in an area of effect.

name: Contempt
descName: The target switches places with the Double.

name: Proximity Trap
descName: Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Perquisition
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and pushes the target by 2 cells.
100% of damage is distributed in the form of Healing to allies in an area of effect around the target.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Malevolent Trap
descName:
Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Earth-type damage.
The damage is increased depending on the number of enemies near the trap.

name: Perfidy
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage. Each trap triggered lowers the AP Cost of the spell Perfidy.
The AP cost reduction disappears when the spell is cast.

name: Calamity
descName: Places a single-cell trap that steals Water-type life in an area of effect and reduces Dodge.

name: Mooring
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Scuttle
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Trawler
descName:
Places a Turret that attracts entities in an area of effect around it and that can lock.
In Evolution III, it can remove MP from targets in the Spyglass state.

name: Transition
descName:
Makes the targeted Turret evolve.
Heals the targeted Turret if it receives an evolution.
Increases targeted allies' Power.

name: Harmattan
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage on the target and reduces its Pushback resistance.

name: Assistance
descName: Teleports the targeted Turret to the first cell available between it and the caster.

name: Armour-Plating
descName: Applies a shield around allies. The shield is bigger on Turrets.

name: Drill
descName:
Places a Turret that inflicts damage.
In Evolution III, it applies Erosion to targets in the Ambush state.

name: Torpedo
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and pushes the target by 4 cells.

name: Corrosion
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and removes MP.

name: Valve
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage on the target and increases the caster's heals.

name: Hypertension
descName: Applies the Evolution III state to the targeted Turret, but kills it at the end of its turn.

name: Bathyscaphe
descName:
Places a Turret that gives Shield to nearby targets.
In Evolution III, it can give 2 AP to targets in the First Aid state.

name: Periscope
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage without line of sight and applies the Spyglass state.

name: Rescue
descName: Heals the target and applies the First Aid state.

name: Short-Circuit
descName:
Kills the targeted Turret and inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect.
Sets the destroyed Turret's recast time to 1 turn.

name: Sonar
descName: Applies the Ambush state to the target and pushes entities next to it by 2 cells.

name: Nautilus
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and removes MP.

name: Seizing
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Recursiveness
descName:
Pushes the target by 4 cells.
If it ends its movement next to one of the caster's Turrets, the Turret teleports it symmetrically and reapplies the spell's effect to the target.

name: Compass
descName:
Swaps the positions of two entities next to each other and aligned. 
Only functions if both are in the spell's area of effect.

name: Souvenir
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and teleports the target back to its previous position.

name: Spontaneous Return
descName: The caster returns to their previous position.

name: Cog
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage. 
The caster gains 1 AP on the following turn.

name: Drying Up
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
On the caster's next turn, the target inflicts damage around itself.

name: Reflect
descName: Immediately teleports the target to its start-of-turn cell.

name: Shadowy Beam
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, inflicts Earth-type damage in an area of effect around it.

name: Accomplice
descName:
Summons a static Accomplice that does not have any spells.
It is killed if another Accomplice is summoned.

name: Disruption
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and teleports the target symmetrically in relation to the caster.

name: Temporal Distortion
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage on enemies.
Teleports the targets to their previous positions.

name: Petrification
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and removes AP.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the spell's AP cost is reduced for 2 turns.

name: Conservation
descName:
Increases the damage suffered by the allied target or caster by 50% for the current turn.
On the following turn, the target reduces damage suffered by 30%.

name: Temporal Suspension
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage on enemies.
Reduces the duration of the effects on enemy targets in the Telefrag state and removes the state.

name: Premonition
descName: On the next turn, the caster teleports to the targeted cell.

name: Pendulum
descName:
The caster teleports symmetrically in relation to the target and inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect on their destination cell.
They then return to their previous position.

name: Time Rift
descName:
The caster switches position with the Accomplice (or the Dial).
At the end of the turn, the Accomplice (or Dial) returns to its previous position.
Synchro cannot be triggered for the duration of Time Rift.

name: Desynchronisation
descName: Places a trap that teleports nearby entities symmetrically.

name: Temporal Oop Shield
descName: If the target suffers damage, its attacker returns to their previous position.

name: Water Clock
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the caster gains 2 AP on the next turn.
Removes the Telefrag state.

name: Gear
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and teleports targets symmetrically in relation to the centre of the area of effect.

name: Knell
descName:
Inflicts Neutral-type damage on enemies around each entity in the Telefrag state.
The more life the caster has, the greater the damage.
Removes the Telefrag state.

name: Temporal Instability
descName:
Places a glyph that returns entities to their previous positions.
The effects of the glyph are also applied when the caster generates a Telefrag.

name: Poltroon Mask
descName:
Applies the Coward Mask.
Increase the long-range damage of the caster and their allies next to them.

name: Agular
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Parafuso
descName: Steals Fire-type life and reduces the target's Power.

name: Tireless Mask
descName:
Applies the Intrepid Mask.
Reduces the damage suffered by the caster and allies next to them.

name: Pivot
descName: Teleports to behind the target.

name: Armadur
descName: Increases the target's MP and Dodge.

name: Scudo
descName: Applies a shield around the target.

name: Estrelia
descName: Steals Water-type health and teleports the target to behind the caster.

name: Hysterical Mask
descName:
Applies the Psychopath Mask.
At the end of their turn, the caster inflicts Neutral-type damage. The more remaining life they have, the greater the damage.

name: Cavalcade
descName: Inflicts Air-type damage and moves the caster closer to the target.

name: Atabak
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and removes AP.

name: Ginga
descName: Applies the Unmovable state and increases the caster's Power.

name: Comedy
descName: Repels the target 4 cells, then attracts it 2 cells.

name: Bocciara
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and increases the caster's Pushback damage.

name: Catalepsy
descName: Inflicts Earth-type damage and removes MP from the target.

name: Apostasy
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and moves the caster away from the target.

name: Ponteira
descName: Inflicts Water-type damage and reduces the target's damage.

name: Inferno
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and increases the caster's Power.

name: Brincaderia
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage and reduces the target's Range.

name: Neurosis
descName: Applies the Gravity state to the target and reduces its Power.

name: Fury
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
The damage is increased depending on the amount of Suffering.
Increases Suffering by 1: the more Suffering the Sacrier has, the more damage they inflict.
Beyond 6 Suffering, the Sacrier changes appearance and gains an additional damage bonus.

name: Light Speed
descName: Teleports in a line to the first available cell and inflicts Air-type damage on the cells crossed.

name: Torture
descName:
Steals Air-type health.
Reduces damage by 15%.
Reduces Suffering by 1.

name: Projection
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
The target is teleported behind the caster.

name: Nervousness
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Damage is increased depending on the amount of Suffering.
Increases Suffering by 1.

name: Stase
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage and removes MP.
Reduces Suffering by 1.

name: Influx
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage.
Attracts targets.

name: Motivating Pain
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.
The damage is increased depending on the amount of Suffering.
Increases Suffering by 1.

name: Decimation
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Damage is increased depending on the amount of Suffering.
Increases Suffering by 1.

name: Blood Bath
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.
Reduces Suffering by 1 for each enemy present in the area.

name: Assault
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies.
Switches places with the target.

name: Absorption
descName:
Steals Earth-type health.
Reduces Suffering by 1.
The less Suffering a Sacrier has, the more Vitality they have.
Beyond negative 6 Suffering, the Sacrier changes appearance and gains a damage reduction bonus.

name: Attraction
descName: Attracts the target.

name: Transposition
descName: Switches places with the target.

name: Mutilation
descName: Increases Suffering by 2.

name: Life Transfer
descName: Transfers part of the caster's HP to allies in the area of effect.

name: Sacrifice
descName: Targets allies in an area of effect to suffer damage instead of them.

name: Convalescence
descName:
Reinitialises Suffering. It cannot evolve for 1 turn.
The caster suffers 10% extra damage for 1 turn.

name: Retribution
descName:
Inflicts Neutral-type damage.
The closer the caster is to having half HP, the more damage is inflicted.

name: Flying Sword
descName: Summons a sword that heals the caster when it inflicts damage.

name: Condensation?
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage in an area of effect.
Attracts the targets to the Sacrier.

name: Ravages
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Moves the caster closer to the target.

name: Cauterisation
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage on the target and the caster.
Increases Suffering by 2.

name: Ritual Bloodletting
descName:
Steals Fire-type health.
Reduces Suffering by 1.

name: Aversion
descName:
Inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.
Repels the targets.

name: Slaughter
descName:
Steals Earth-type health in an area of effect.
Reduces Suffering by 1 for each enemy hit.

name: Gash
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Damage is increased with each increase in Suffering.
Increases Suffering by 1.

name: Carnage
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Increases Suffering by 2.

name: Desolation
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage and heals the caster.
Reduces Suffering by 1.

name: Riposte
descName: Moves the caster closer to their attacker when they suffer long-range damage.

name: Clobbering
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage.
Damage is increased depending on the amount of Suffering.
Increases Suffering by 1.

name: Hostility
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Pushes the target.

name: Dissolution
descName:
Steals Water-type health.
Applies a Dodge penalty.
Reduces Suffering by 1.

name: Perfusion
descName: For 1 turn, the target is healed of up to 25% of the damage inflicted on the caster.

name: Coagulation
descName: Reduces Suffering by 2.

name: Punishment
descName:
Applies the Gravity state in an area of effect.
Inflicts 2% of the caster's HP in damage for each unit of Suffering.

name: Bloodthirsty Madness
descName: For 1 turn, the caster reflects 25% of damage they suffer in an area of effect around them.

name: Blood Pact
descName:
The damage inflicted by the target is reduced by 30%.
The target reflects 50% of the damage suffered by the caster.

name: Fluctuation
descName:
Increases MP.
Applies the Unable to Lock and Unlockable states.

name: Penitence
descName: The caster switches places with the the target when it is attacked.

name: Swift Sword
descName: Summons a controllable sword that attracts.

name: Obliteration
descName: Inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Fuze
descName: Makes all the caster's bombs explode.

name: Latent Explobomb
descName: Places a bomb on the next turn that inflicts Fire-type damage.

name: Ruse
descName: Moves the caster closer to the targeted bomb.

name: Musket
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage.
Increases the combo bonus of bombs next to the target.

name: Latent Grenado
descName: Places a bomb on the next turn that inflicts Air-type damage.

name: Cadence
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage on enemies in an area of effect.
The spell's effects are replayed from each bomb in the area of effect.

name: Strategy
descName: The targeted bomb teleports to its previous position.

name: Stolen Goods
descName:
Inflicts Water-type damage on enemies.
Attracts the target.

name: Latent Water Bomb
descName: Places a bomb on the next turn that inflicts Water-type damage.

name: Gluing Explobomb
descName:
Places a bomb on the target. The bomb may be activated by activation spells or bomb explosions.
When it is activated, it inflicts Fire-type damage in an area of effect.

name: Fulmination
descName: Inflicts damage in an area of effect for each type of bomb present on the field and makes the bombs explode.

name: Arquebus
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage on enemies.
Reduces the duration of active effects by 1 turn.

name: Machine Gun
descName:
Inflicts Air-type damage.
Repels the target.

name: Magnetic Trap
descName: Places a trap that attracts bombs and triggers them.

name: Latent Seismobomb
descName: Places a bomb on the next turn that inflicts Earth-type damage.

name: Walking Bomb
descName:
Summons a controllable bomb that can obtain an element by targeting an elemental bomb.
At the end of its turn, it dies and places a bomb in the corresponding element.
It dies after 2 turns if it has not obtained any elements.

name: Weigh Down
descName:
Inflicts Earth-type damage between aligned bombs in different elements.
Affected bombs gain a 25% combo bonus. 
Requires targeting a bomb.

name: Imposture
descName:
Switches places with the target.
If it is a bomb, increases its combo by 40%.

name: Megabomb
descName:
Places a controllable Megabomb that inflicts Neutral-type damage.
Its damage increases each time it devours a bomb.
It triggers the other bombs when it explodes. It loses 1 HP per bomb devoured.
It explodes if it dies.

name: Seismobomb
descName:
Places a bomb that inflicts Earth-type damage.
Explodes automatically and inflicts less damage if it is cast directly on a target.
